title: The Age of Women
description: And if the world was led by women?Walter is coming to the end of his days. Beside him is his partner Tracy, with whom he has not only re-established a dormant love, but also envisioned a future society shaped by women.What has led Walter to imagine such an upheaval? The longing of a society free of violence. A visionary scientist, he spent most of his career trying to find a way to harness the power of the mind with the end goal of controlling human impulses.An incredible life, the real protagonists of which are the women who populate it and provide the origin and inspiration for his vision. Women who have influenced him, women who have suffered, women who hide secretsâ€¦
author: Riccardo Mazzocchio
